name: Dotnet CLI
description: Installs .NET and its CLI. Offers options to install a specific version of .NET, additional versions of .NET, or just the .NET runtime.

version.description: Version of .NET to install. Use 'latest' for the latest version, 'lts' for the latest LTS version, 'X' for the latest of a major version, or 'X.Y.Z' for a specific version.

additionalVersions.description: Comma-separated list of additional .NET versions to install. Use 'latest' for the latest version, 'lts' for the latest LTS version, 'X' for the latest of a major version, or 'X.Y.Z' for a specific version.

runtimeOnly.description: Only install the .NET runtime. If true, then the .NET SDK is not installed.
